Post.title: Mapo Tofu
Post.description: Ready to eat Mapo Tofu with Rice

Post.steps: [{"instruction":"Cook rice on the side","id":"1740308787602"},{"instruction":"Cook the veggies a little","id":"1740308748898"},{"instruction":"Add the tofu either now or at the end","id":"1740308760687"},{"instruction":"Add the Mapu Tofu packet","id":"1740308771814"},{"instruction":"Cook a little more","id":"1740308775714"}]

Post.title: Lime Juice

Post.title: Choco walnut fudge
Post.steps: [{"instruction":"Melt butter","id":"1740502536826"},{"instruction":"Add milk and reduce to 1 glass","id":"1740502547777"},{"instruction":"Add mithai mate","id":"1740502559850"},{"instruction":"Add choco, almond, walnut( keep some aside for topping)","id":"1740502589186"},{"instruction":"Add all of above while on gas","id":"1740502610408"},{"instruction":"Mix well- but don't stir vigorously","id":"1740502631034"},{"instruction":"Set in fridge ( about 1-2 hrs)","id":"1740502655512"},{"instruction":"Cut into squares or just scoop and Serve","id":"1740502697293"}]
Post.notes:
Ingredients

1.5 pkt morde dark chocolate

.5 pkt morde milk

1 200ml mithai mate

2 cups almond powdered

4 cups  walnut crumble

2 glass milk

1 tbsp butter

Post.title: Gajar Halwa
Post.steps: [{"instruction":"Clean the carrots","id":"1740309647516"},{"instruction":"Cook the carrots in Ghee","id":"1740311333833"},{"instruction":"Add Milk and Sugar, keep stirring","id":"1740311346850"}]
Post.notes: Keep stirring to avoid burning at the bottom of the pan.

Post.title: Watermelon Paneer (Feta) Salad
Post.ingredients: [{"name":"Lime juice","amount":"1-2 tsp","id":"1740501646768"},{"name":"Black salt","amount":"Half tsp","id":"1740501664689"},{"name":"Fresh Paneer","amount":"150- 200 gm","id":"1740501707153"},{"name":"Pepper","amount":"Half tsp","id":"1740501754021"},{"name":"Zest","amount":"1/4 tsp","id":"1740501783279"},{"name":"Watermelon chunks","amount":"1 big salad bowl","id":"1740502491894"}]
Post.steps: [{"instruction":"Chop the watermelon into bite sized pieces.","id":"1740502224608"},{"instruction":"Cut  the paneer into tiny pieces leaving aside about 50gms which you can crumble and add as garnish","id":"1740502279144"},{"instruction":"Add black salt,  pepper,  lemon zest,  lemon juice and paneer cubes.","id":"1740502297242"},{"instruction":"Toss","id":"1740502317846"},{"instruction":"Transfer into serving plate and add the crumbled paneer on top.","id":"1740502331577"},{"instruction":"Serve Chilled.","id":"1740502341471"}]
Post.notes:
If the watermelon is not sweet,  add a spoonful of powdered sugar when you toss it

Deseeded watermelon tastes best :)

You can add a bit of finely Chopped mint leaves 

Flavors need to be mild- lightly salty, sweet and zingy but largely Chilled. ( not frozen)

Post.title: Masala Rice
Post.description: Many combinations and possibilities are possible. Change the main masala, and just create a new variety. I had a palak paneer ready masala, I added that this time.
Post.ingredients: [{"name":"Rice","amount":"1 bowl","id":"1740583526895"},{"name":"Onion","amount":"1","id":"1740583535623"},{"name":"Mix Vegetables (carrot, capsicum, tomato, beans, peas, potato, etc)","amount":"1 bowl","id":"1740583565904"},{"name":"Garlic","amount":"2-3","id":"1740583578918"},{"name":"Ginger garlic paste","amount":"1 spoon","id":"1740583589743"},{"name":"Green chilli","amount":"1-2","id":"1740583857755"},{"name":"Kasuri methi, dried pudina, etc","amount":"1-2 big pinches","id":"1740583637946"},{"name":"Paneer/Tofu","amount":"Same quantity as veggies","id":"1740583693757"},{"name":"Any primary masala","amount":"2-3 spoons","id":"1740583720037"},{"name":"Vegetables broth cube","amount":"1","id":"1740583765600"}]
Post.steps: [{"instruction":"Wash and keep rice on the side","id":"1740583834979"},{"instruction":"Chop/Slice everything","id":"1740583911872"},{"instruction":"Cook the onions in a cooker in some oil (more brown is better)","id":"1740583825660"},{"instruction":"Add the aromatics, continue cooking ","id":"1740583943342"},{"instruction":"Add the vegetables, continue cooking","id":"1740583965063"},{"instruction":"Add the primary masala, salt, any other masala for flavor and spice","id":"1740584030593"},{"instruction":"Add paneer, continue cooking","id":"1740584171191"},{"instruction":"Add rice and also add water to cover everything and a little bit more","id":"1740584082083"},{"instruction":"Add the broth cube, herbs, garam masala","id":"1740584113524"},{"instruction":"Taste and adjust for spice, sour, salt, flavor","id":"1740584143319"},{"instruction":"Put the lid on and cook for about 10 minutes","id":"1740584224149"},{"instruction":"Eat it with papad","id":"1740584941929"},{"instruction":"Enjoy :)","id":"1740584254713"}]

Post.title: Red Sauce Pasta
Post.ingredients: [{"name":"Onion","amount":"1","id":"1740673966803"},{"name":"Garlic","amount":"Lots","id":"1740673980224"},{"name":"Tomato","amount":"4-5","id":"1740673988449"},{"name":"Chilli flakes","amount":"1-2 spoons","id":"1740674020691"},{"name":"Pizza seasoning","amount":"1-2 spoons","id":"1740674030650"},{"name":"Pasta veggies (bell peppers, brocolli, etc)","amount":"1 bowl","id":"1740674143323"},{"name":"Pasta","amount":"1/3 packet","id":"1740674164805"},{"name":"Cheese","amount":"2 cubes","id":"1740674190686"}]
Post.steps: [{"instruction":"Cook the pasta and keep it aside (don't forget to salt the pasta water)","id":"1740674067074"},{"instruction":"Keep some pasta water","id":"1740674087759"},{"instruction":"Cook the onions a little, add all the garlic","id":"1740674201763"},{"instruction":"Cut the tomatoes in half, make a small slit on the back and add them to the pan","id":"1740674227808"},{"instruction":"Add salt, pizza seasoning, chilli flakes, some pepper, a little bit of sugar","id":"1740674259807"},{"instruction":"Cover and cook for 5-7 mins","id":"1740674271694"},{"instruction":"Keep adding pasta water as and when needed or if it gets dry and starts to burn","id":"1740674496544"},{"instruction":"Open, and remove the skin of the tomatoes","id":"1740674294924"},{"instruction":"If you have basil, or want to add anything else for flavor, now is the time","id":"1740674324165"},{"instruction":"Taste and adjust the salt, spice, herb balance","id":"1740674347706"},{"instruction":"Cover and cook for 5 more mins","id":"1740674394959"},{"instruction":"Add the veggies, cheese (some butter/cream too if you want)","id":"1740674458855"},{"instruction":"Cook a little, and taste","id":"1740674552132"},{"instruction":"Add the pasta and mix well","id":"1740674622601"},{"instruction":"Taste again","id":"1740674636564"},{"instruction":"While serving, grate some cheese on top and sprinkle some pizza seasoning","id":"1740674669936"},{"instruction":"Enjoy :)","id":"1740674674580"}]

Post.title: 2-min Chapomelette
Post.steps: [{"instruction":"Heat oil in pan","id":"1740588221182"},{"instruction":"Break Chapati in small pieces and put on pan","id":"1740588241152"},{"instruction":"Wait till a bit crispy","id":"1740588252169"},{"instruction":"Break open an egg","id":"1740588261634"},{"instruction":"Add pinch of salt","id":"1740588268368"},{"instruction":"Add crushed pepper","id":"1740588273719"},{"instruction":"Wait till golden brown on the bottom","id":"1740588293289"},{"instruction":"Flip","id":"1740588296496"}]

Post.title: Steamed Eggplant
Post.description:
Asian style steamed Eggplant with rice.

Inspiration from here: https://bakinghermann.com/liang-ban-qie-zi-chinese-steamed-eggplant-salad/

I had this in Shanghai, and it was sooo good, had to try it.
Post.ingredients: [{"name":"Chinese Eggplant (long and thin)","amount":"4","id":"1741022408920"},{"name":"Garlic","amount":"10","id":"1741022431692"},{"name":"Ginger","amount":"Half of the garlic","id":"1741022599221"},{"name":"Spring Onion","amount":"5","id":"1741022439675"},{"name":"Red Chilli","amount":"2-3","id":"1741022494877"},{"name":"Sesame seeds","amount":"1 spoon","id":"1741022508951"},{"name":"Soy Sauce","amount":"2-3 spoons (adjust yourself)","id":"1741022554585"},{"name":"Vinegar","amount":"Half of the soy sauce","id":"1741022528234"},{"name":"Salt/MSG","amount":"1 pinch","id":"1741022582046"},{"name":"Oil","amount":"2-3 spoons","id":"1741022762038"},{"name":"Rice","amount":"1 bowl","id":"1741022656107"}]
Post.steps: [{"instruction":"Cook rice and keep it aside","id":"1741022662297"},{"instruction":"Cut eggplants into cylinders and soak them in water + salt for 10 mins","id":"1741022702260"},{"instruction":"Steam the eggplants (you can do this in a makeshift steamer too)","id":"1741022740501"},{"instruction":"Once you can easily poke a knife in them, they are done","id":"1741022853017"},{"instruction":"Cut them lengthwise into 4-5 pieces each","id":"1741022875518"},{"instruction":"Chop everything else and add all the dry ingredients to a small bowl","id":"1741022832222"},{"instruction":"Heat up some oil, and then directly pour over the dry ingredients","id":"1741022914301"},{"instruction":"Mix in the wet ingredients","id":"1741022924022"},{"instruction":"Taste and adjust","id":"1741022930315"},{"instruction":"Try to make this a bit liquid-y so that you can eat well with the rice","id":"1741023027548"},{"instruction":"Pour the mixture over the eggplants","id":"1741022941718"},{"instruction":"Mix everything and eat with the rice","id":"1741022967023"}]
Post.notes:
The flavored oil method can be used on a number of things.

Use chilli flakes if you don't have red chilli

Post.title: Green Chutney for dosa
Post.description: This is a chutney similar in taste to the one that is made by Mankar Dosa (Pune). I don't know how they make it, but this is just something I randomly came up with and liked the taste, so have been making it often. Today, specifically, made it for eating with Tomato Omelette. Will later post about White (Coconut) chutney as well.
Post.ingredients: [{"name":"Fried Gram/Futana Dal","amount":"3tbsp","id":"1741192762787"},{"name":"Roasted Peanuts","amount":"3tbsp","id":"1741192788064"},{"name":"Grated dried coconut","amount":"2tbsp","id":"1741192809885"},{"name":"Coriander leaves","amount":"1/2cup","id":"1741192845903"},{"name":"Mint leaves (pudina)","amount":"2tbsp","id":"1741192944807"},{"name":"Curd","amount":"2tbsp","id":"1741192959435"},{"name":"Green chilli","amount":"1/2-1","id":"1741192972452"},{"name":"Salt","amount":"As per taste","id":"1741192997044"},{"name":"Sugar","amount":"As per taste","id":"1741193004182"},{"name":"Water","amount":"To adjust thickness","id":"1741193012181"}]
Post.steps: [{"instruction":"Without adding water, blend all ingredients in a mixer","id":"1741193221305"},{"instruction":"Add water as per required thickness and blend again","id":"1741193251271"}]
Post.notes: Optionally, to add some more taste and texture, you can give a tadka once the chutney is ready. On a gas stove, heat 1-1.5tbps oil with mustard seeds. Once the mustard seeds start popping, switch off the gas. Immediately add some jeera, curry leaves and dries red chilli. Pour it over the chutney and mix. Don't stir a lot.

Post.title: Healthy Mukhwas
Post.description: A throw- in- whatever- you- have  after- meal mouth freshener, which doubles up as a healthy munchie snack.

Post.title: Cooker boiled rice
Post.steps: [{"instruction":"Wash rice 3 times with water","id":"1741442722676"},{"instruction":"Add 1.5 times water (If you are using aged rice, use 2 times)","id":"1741442751972"},{"instruction":"Add salt","id":"1741442760496"},{"instruction":"Put in pressure cooker","id":"1741442813771"},{"instruction":"Take 1 whistle on high gas flame and 2 on low flame","id":"1741442834259"},{"instruction":"Done. You can pair it with numerous things. One unique combination I have for lazy cooking days is: ghee + onion garlic masala.","id":"1741442893981"}]

Post.title: Dumpling Soup
Post.ingredients: [{"name":"Onion","amount":"1","id":"1742225838530"},{"name":"Garlic","amount":"5-6","id":"1742225844498"},{"name":"Ginger","amount":"Same as garlic","id":"1742225856280"},{"name":"Chilli","amount":"1","id":"1742226028950"},{"name":"Salt, Pepper, MSG","amount":"Pinches","id":"1742225871809"},{"name":"Soy sauce, Vinegar","amount":"1 dash","id":"1742225890245"},{"name":"Veggies (Carrot, Beans, etc)","amount":"Same as onion","id":"1742225928661"},{"name":"Water","amount":"2-3 cups","id":"1742226120014"},{"name":"Veggie Cube","amount":"2","id":"1742226074871"},{"name":"Ready momos","amount":"10 pieces","id":"1742225997348"}]
Post.steps: [{"instruction":"Cook the Onion, Garlic, Ginger, Chilli in some oil","id":"1742226045038"},{"instruction":"Add in the veggies","id":"1742226052583"},{"instruction":"Add water and everything else apart from the dumplings","id":"1742226162909"},{"instruction":"Taste and adjust","id":"1742226175018"},{"instruction":"Once the soup comes to boil, add the dumplings directly and it and let them cook for about 5 minutes","id":"1742226202855"},{"instruction":"Keep the flame low, making sure they don't break open","id":"1742226220291"},{"instruction":"After 5-7 minutes, it should be done","id":"1742226260742"},{"instruction":"Enjoy :)","id":"1742226264569"}]
Post.notes:
I used the Mix Veg Momos from Wow Momos. These come separated so have less chance of breaking.

Don't worry even if the dumplings break. It adds to the flavor!

Post.title: Ratatouille
Post.description: Ratatouille: Italian style mix veggies with bread
Post.ingredients: [{"name":"Onion","amount":"1","id":"1742317033007"},{"name":"Garlic","amount":"4-5","id":"1742317038512"},{"name":"Bell peppers - Yellow and Red","amount":"1 each","id":"1742317066306"},{"name":"Zucchini - Yellow and Green","amount":"1 each","id":"1742317080508"},{"name":"Eggplant","amount":"1","id":"1742317088818"},{"name":"Tomatoes","amount":"4","id":"1742317101735"},{"name":"Mixed herbs","amount":"1-2 spoons","id":"1742317112937"},{"name":"Salt, Pepper, Sugar","amount":"Little","id":"1742317132923"},{"name":"Tomato Ketchup","amount":"To balance flavor","id":"1742317146964"},{"name":"Water","amount":"To balance consistency","id":"1742317155472"},{"name":"Feta cheese","amount":"1 packet","id":"1742317231673"},{"name":"Bread","amount":"4 slices","id":"1742317372997"}]
Post.steps: [{"instruction":"Dice everything","id":"1742317164740"},{"instruction":"Cook all the veggies one by one (except tomatoes) and keep them aside","id":"1742317202480"},{"instruction":"Add everything back, add the tomatoes, add the herbs, salt, pepper","id":"1742317253357"},{"instruction":"Taste and balance with sugar and/or tomato ketchup, and more of the above","id":"1742317284324"},{"instruction":"If it gets too dry, add a little water. Or add more if you want it to be saucy","id":"1742317305448"},{"instruction":"Cook on low for 20 minutes","id":"1742317320528"},{"instruction":"Add feta cheese cubes (or crumble) on top when serving","id":"1742317354877"},{"instruction":"Toast the bread and dip or have it like a bruschetta","id":"1742317402506"},{"instruction":"Enjoy :)","id":"1742317407383"}]
Post.notes:
You can grind the tomatoes for a much saucy consistency.

A crusty bread is better.

Post.title: Veggie Doner Bun
Post.description:
Using leftovers to create a veggie doner kebab. It is more of a burger style.

I used mix grilled vegetables from the previous day (Ratatouille), used some frozen burger patties to make this easy.

I wanted to use pita bread, but it was out of stock. Used pav instead, so it became more like a slider.
Post.ingredients: [{"name":"Grilled Vegetables","amount":"1 Cup","id":"1742398672950"},{"name":"Burger Patty","amount":"2","id":"1742398759432"},{"name":"Sesame seeds","amount":"1 spoon","id":"1742398776553"},{"name":"Pickled Onion","amount":"Little","id":"1742398805693"},{"name":"Mayonnaise","amount":"2 spoons","id":"1742398945884"},{"name":"Garlic","amount":"3-4","id":"1742398954854"},{"name":"Salt, Pepper","amount":"1 spoon","id":"1742398972765"},{"name":"Salt, Pepper, Chilli Powder, Cumin","amount":"1 spoon","id":"1742399010609"},{"name":"Hot sauce","amount":"1 spoon","id":"1742399127699"},{"name":"Pav","amount":"4","id":"1742399016533"},{"name":"Cheese","amount":"1 cube","id":"1742399024859"}]
Post.steps: [{"instruction":"Cook the burger patty until crispy, then cut into pieces","id":"1742399052918"},{"instruction":"Toast the sesame seeds and keep on the side","id":"1742399075772"},{"instruction":"Chop the garlic and add to the mayonnaise. Add some Chilli Powder and some hot sauce to it","id":"1742399120865"},{"instruction":"Taste and adjust the sauce","id":"1742399421828"},{"instruction":"Heat the leftover grilled vegetables. Add salt, Chilli Powder, Cumin, maybe even some pizza seasoning","id":"1742399192855"},{"instruction":"Taste and adjust the veggies","id":"1742399441117"},{"instruction":"Lightly toast the pav","id":"1742399204025"},{"instruction":"Assemble: Apply sauce to both sides of the pav, add a big layer to grilled veggies, add 2-3 pieces of the patty, add some sesame seeds and pickled onions, grate some cheese","id":"1742399362274"},{"instruction":"Enjoy :)","id":"1742399379611"}]
Post.notes: You can cook some fries too. Add it inside or on the side.
